a good ol'game developed by valve a long time ago. It is a pretty meh sequel with less weapons and cool things than the original. The game is almost dead but the saving grace is the chill community, at least whats left of it. Buy it as a part of the full valve pack on sale at 25.00 to get this and many more games as this one isn't worth it on its own but is a nice thing to have along with great games like Half-life 2 and portal 2 and many others

This game is a classic and is still holding up today both Graphically, and Community! There are ALWAYS servers online with people in them and even full servers! The Community Hosts Matches too, like all planned out it's cool. For the price you should get both Day of Defeat, and Day of Defeat: Source although I like DoD:S better DoD is still a great game aswell. Robin Williams had good taste in shooters.

jogo estratégico
Addictive!

For day of defeat being so old, I'm quite impressed with the amount of people who are still playing it. I never have a difficult time finding servers to join. The gameplay is exciting and doesn't drag very much. However, the guns have uncontrollable recoil. I don't know how anyone manages to hit a target with such efficiency like they do. At least machine guns have bipods that ease the recoil significantly. Final Verdict: 8/10

fun WWII game

An old, fun game from yester-year that STILL has an active playerbase... somehow

Even better, you can make your own server if you have the inclination and hardware. 

Just remember that almost every class has explosives, and there's a button to throw ammo boxes at team-mates (your own box doesn't fill your own ammo, only other players ammo).
